title: Ticket #4354: Starter logs are never deleted when extension is Cluster or JobId
description:
When STARTER_LOG_NAME_APPEND has a value of JobId or Cluster, Then the extension on the StarterLog.extension will be different for each job, but there is no code in the STARTD that will clean up starter logs.

The STARTD should periodically delete up old =StarterLog=(s), perhaps at the same time that it verifies that is cleans up the execute directory.

It should be as simple as deleting files that match StarterLog.* that have not been written to for more than a few hours, since active logs are touched periodically.
